ygData.subject: Heritrix v1 frontier and reconstruction files from ARC
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am using heritrix 1.14.3 and the frontier budget functionality (described here: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Frontier+queue+budgets)

Hi,

I am using heritrix 1.14.3 and the frontier budget functionality (desc=
ribed here: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Frontier+queu=
e+budgets)

I set budget limit to 20,000. UnitCost and SurtPrefixAssigment =
policy.

Well, maybe this will be more clear:

<string name=3D"queue-assign=
ment-policy">
org.archive.crawler.frontier.SurtAuthorityQueueAssignmentPoli=
cy
</string>
<string name=3D"force-queue-assignment"/>
<boolean name=3D"pau=
se-at-start">true</boolean>
<boolean name=3D"pause-at-finish">true</boolean=
>
<boolean name=3D"source-tag-seeds">false</boolean>
<boolean name=3D"recov=
ery-log-enabled">true</boolean>
<boolean name=3D"hold-queues">true</boolean=
>
<integer name=3D"balance-replenish-amount">3000</integer>
<integer name=
=3D"error-penalty-amount">100</integer>
<long name=3D"queue-total-budget">2=
0000</long>
−
<string name=3D"cost-policy">
org.archive.crawler.front=
ier.UnitCostAssignmentPolicy
</string>
<long name=3D"snooze-deactivate-ms">=
300</long>

When the crawl has been paused I forced generation of final rep=
orts to disk. In such way I can import this data to excel sheet and analyze=
 it. The most interesting is host-report.txt. And there I found that some o=
f queues has less than the limit (e.g. 8500) downloaded and despite that ha=
s some urls in remaining column.

for example:
url: kvetena.cz
downloaded: =
5998
remaining: 29084

I am not sure how this could happen and how to reach=
 limit of these sites.

Second question.

There have been risen requirement=
 to extract data from one domain.

Our case:
- the provider that hosted dom=
ain lost their data
- we have have two years crawls in our archive
- we nee=
d to extract the data just before the crash and restore it exactly as it wa=
s on the server

What is the best and fastest way to do that? I am asking b=
ecause I am sure that this is not unusual case.

Thanks a lot,

best regard=
s.

Adam
